docs.snippet: LONDON Nov. 8, (Associated Press.) --Premier Lloyd George, speaking at the Lord Mayor's banquet tonight and referring to the Supreme Council's effort for Russian peace early this year, said: "I hope the time is not distant when the powers will be...
docs.lead_paragraph: LONDON Nov. 8, (Associated Press.) --Premier Lloyd George, speaking at the Lord Mayor's banquet tonight and referring to the Supreme Council's effort for Russian peace early this year, said: "I hope the time is not distant when the powers will be able to renew that attempt with better prospects of success."
docs.abstract: says in address at Lord Mayor's banquet that he hopes Powers will be able to renew attempt for peace; says England will not intervene again

headline.main: LLOYD GEORGE HINTS AT NEW RUSSIA PLAN; Hopes the Powers Will Be Able to Renew the Attempt for Peace Made Last Spring. NO MORE INTERVENTION Confident of a Just Adriatic Settlement--Allies Agreed on EndingTurkish Rule Over Other Races.

docs.snippet: The first Pan-American Architectural Congress, planned for 1916 but postponed because of the war, is to be held in Montevideo, Uruguay, March 1 to 7, according to an announcement just received by the Pan-American Union in Washington.
docs.lead_paragraph: The first Pan-American Architectural Congress, planned for 1916 but postponed because of the war, is to be held in Montevideo, Uruguay, March 1 to 7, according to an announcement just received by the Pan-American Union in Washington.
docs.abstract: Will be held in Montevideo in March, 1920

headline.main: ARCHITECTS' CONGRESS.; First Pan-American Meeting to be Held in Montevideo.

docs.snippet: WASHINGTON, Nov. 27.--Thanksgiving Day was observed generally today in Washington with Goverment departments closed and many officials absent. Secretary Daniels and many high naval officials attended the Navy football game here, but other Cabinet...
docs.lead_paragraph: WASHINGTON, Nov. 27.--Thanksgiving Day was observed generally today in Washington with Goverment departments closed and many officials absent. Secretary Daniels and many high naval officials attended the Navy football game here, but other Cabinet officers who were in town had no special plans.

headline.main: President Has Thanksgiving Dinner In Bed; Cabinet Officers at Pan-American Mass

docs.snippet: PARIS, Dec. 8 (Associated Press).-- The Supreme Council's notes dealing with the Peace Treaty were delivered to Baron von Lersner, head of the German delegation, this evening.
docs.lead_paragraph: PARIS, Dec. 8 (Associated Press).-- The Supreme Council's notes dealing with the Peace Treaty were delivered to Baron von Lersner, head of the German delegation, this evening.
docs.abstract: Peace Conference Supreme Council, in notes handed to German delegation, demands surrender

headline.main: DENOUNCE GERMAN DELAY; Allies Reject Demands for Treaty Changes on Senate's Action. LERSNER HAS ALLIED NOTES They Grant Only Minor Concessions to Objections tothe Protocol.FIRM ON SCAPA FLOW GUILTBut promise to Consider Economic Effect of Insisting on Full Penalties. MAY ADOPT FOCH'S PLAN. Council Is Expected to Form Interallied Staff to Deal with Germany. By EDWIN L. JAMES. THINK GERMANY WILL YIELD. British Official Circles Take Hopeful View of Situation.

docs.snippet: MEXICO CITY, Dec. 16.--Gabriel Terra, the Uruguayan Minister of Foreign Relations, has offered the services of his country as mediator in the difficulties between Mexico and the United States, according to advices received by the Mexican Foreign...
docs.lead_paragraph: MEXICO CITY, Dec. 16.--Gabriel Terra, the Uruguayan Minister of Foreign Relations, has offered the services of his country as mediator in the difficulties between Mexico and the United States, according to advices received by the Mexican Foreign Relations Department here from Mexican Charge d'Affaires Enriquez at Montevideo today.

docs.snippet: WASHINGTON, Dec. 21.--New York bankers and business men will have an important part in the forthcoming second Pan American financial conference which is to be held in Washington from Jan. 12 to 17. Ministers of Finance and prominent financiers from...
docs.lead_paragraph: WASHINGTON, Dec. 21.--New York bankers and business men will have an important part in the forthcoming second Pan American financial conference which is to be held in Washington from Jan. 12 to 17. Ministers of Finance and prominent financiers from the various Pan American Republics are coming to Washington for this important conference.
